meanings.sent1: The whispers were inaudible in the noisy room.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the falling leaves was inaudible from a distance.
meanings.sent3: The mouse's tiny squeaks were inaudible to the elephants nearby.
meanings.sent4: The distant music was inaudible, like a ghostly melody.
meanings.sent5: The inaudible footsteps of the ninja made him a silent warrior.

meanings.definition: Not loud enough to be heard.
meanings.sent1: The inaudible hum of the refrigerator was soothing at night.
meanings.sent2: Her inaudible voice got lost in the bustling crowd.
meanings.sent3: The inaudible alarm clock made her late for work.
meanings.sent4: The inaudible raindrops tapped gently on the window.
meanings.sent5: The inaudible whispers of the wind carried secrets across the field.
